column3: “Super Lemon Haze and Deadhead OG made this excellent Sativa strain. Loads of citrus which means lots of Limonene and that means energy! Great looking flower too.”

“I have been awaiting to try Lemon Zest Sativa for about the last two month ever since I heard of its coming availability in Montreal, Quebec a rare import from points further South of here.  

I have always loved the Lemon Citrus terpenes of strains such as Lemon Mazar Y Sharif, Lemon Skunk, Lemon Haze and many others.  

I got two ounces from one of our delivery services that are super popular here pre legalization ...”
“Big surprise with this one. A big vape of this flower made my head explode into ten million exquisite pieces, on more than one occasion. Grown at Moongazer Farm in 2017, Northern California.”
“Smells nice, the smoke was smooth and very citrus aroma. Very uplifting and energizing effect.”
“Great warm lemon smell! Lift up high! :)”
